casebody.data:
Adrianne BRANDECKER, Individually and as Executrix and Executrix Ad Prosequendum of the Estate of Lorenz Brandecker Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
E & B MILL SUPPLY CO., et al., Defendants,
and
The Scotts Company, LLC, Defendant-Petitioner. C-1005 September Term 2017
080947 Supreme Court of New Jersey. July 11, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-005733-14 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
